verses.kjv: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
verses.web: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
verses.ct: Adam, Seth, Enosh,

verses.kjv: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
verses.web: Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,
verses.ct: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,

verses.kjv: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
verses.web: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
verses.ct: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,

verses.kjv: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.web: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.ct: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

verses.kjv: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
verses.web: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.
verses.ct: Japheth's sons were Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
verses.web: The sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.
verses.ct: Gomer's sons were Ashchenaz, Riphath, and Togarmah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
verses.web: The sons of Javan: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, and Rodanim.
verses.ct: Javan's sons were Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

verses.kjv: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
verses.web: The sons of Ham: Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
verses.ct: Ham's sons were Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
verses.web: The sons of Cush: Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raama, Sabteca. The sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.ct: Cush's sons were Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raamah, and Sabtecha. Raamah's sons were Sheba and Dedan.

verses.kjv: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
verses.web: Cush became the father of Nimrod. He began to be a mighty one in the earth.
verses.ct: Cush was the father of Nimrod, who became the first great warrior on earth.

verses.kjv: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
verses.web: Mizraim became the father of Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,
verses.ct: Mizraim was the father of the Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,

verses.kjv: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
verses.web: Pathrusim, Casluhim (where the Philistines came from), and Caphtorim.
verses.ct: Pathrusim, Casluhim (from whom the Philistines descended), and Caphthorim.

verses.kjv: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
verses.web: Canaan became the father of Sidon his firstborn, Heth,
verses.ct: Canaan's firstborn was Zidon. He was also the father of Heth,

verses.kjv: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
verses.web: the Jebusite, and the Amorite, the Girgashite,
verses.ct: as well as the Jebusites, the Amorites, the Girgashites,

verses.kjv: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
verses.web: the Hivite, the Arkite, the Sinite,
verses.ct: the Hivites, the Arkites, the Sinites,

verses.kjv: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
verses.web: the Arvadite, the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
verses.ct: the Arvadites, the Zemarites, and the Hamathites.

verses.kjv: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
verses.web: The sons of Shem: Elam, Asshur, Arpachshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, and Meshech.
verses.ct: Shem's sons were Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, and Meshech.

verses.kjv: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
verses.web: Arpachshad became the father of Shelah, and Shelah became the father of Eber.
verses.ct: Arphaxad was the father of Shelah, and Shelah was the father of Eber.

verses.kjv: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother’s name was Joktan.
verses.web: To Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.
verses.ct: Eber had 2 sons. One was named Peleg, because during his lifetime the earth was divided. His brother was named Joktan.

verses.kjv: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
verses.web: Joktan became the father of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
verses.ct: Joktan was the father of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,

verses.kjv: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
verses.web: Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
verses.ct: Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,

verses.kjv: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
verses.web: Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
verses.ct: Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,

verses.kjv: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
verses.web: Ophir, Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
verses.ct: Ophir, Havilah, and Jobab. All of these were Joktan's sons.

verses.kjv: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
verses.web: Shem, Arpachshad, Shelah,
verses.ct: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,

verses.kjv: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
verses.web: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
verses.ct: Eber, Peleg, Reu,

verses.kjv: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
verses.web: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
verses.ct: Serug, Nahor, Terah,

verses.kjv: Abram; the same is Abraham.
verses.web: Abram (also called Abraham).
verses.ct: Abram — who is Abraham.

verses.kjv: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
verses.web: The sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.
verses.ct: Abraham's sons were Isaac and Ishmael.

verses.kjv: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
verses.web: These are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
verses.ct: Here are their descendants: Ishmael's firstborn was Nebaioth, followed by Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,

verses.kjv: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
verses.web: Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
verses.ct: Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,

verses.kjv: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
verses.web: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
verses.ct: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These were Ishmael's sons.

verses.kjv: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
verses.web: The sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bore Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, and Shuah. The sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.ct: Abraham's concubine Keturah gave birth to Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, and Shuah. Jokshan's sons were Sheba and Dedan.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
verses.web: The sons of Midian: Ephah, Epher, Hanoch, Abida, and Eldaah. All these were the sons of Keturah.
verses.ct: Midian's sons were Ephah, Epher, Henoch, Abida, and Eldaah. All of these were descendants of Keturah.

verses.kjv: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
verses.web: Abraham became the father of Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.
verses.ct: Abraham was the father of Isaac. Isaac's sons were Esau and Israel.

verses.kjv: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
verses.web: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam, and Korah.
verses.ct: Esau's sons were Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jaalam, and Korah.

verses.kjv: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
verses.web: The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, and Amalek.
verses.ct: Eliphaz's sons were Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, and Amalek.

verses.kjv: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
verses.web: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
verses.ct: Reuel's sons were Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezar, and Dishan.
verses.web: The sons of Seir: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer, and Dishan.
verses.ct: Seir's sons were Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer, and Dishan.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan’s sister.
verses.web: The sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam; and Timna was Lotan’s sister.
verses.ct: Lotan's sons were Hori and Homam. Lotan's sister was Timna.

verses.kjv: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
verses.web: The sons of Shobal: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. The sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah.
verses.ct: Shobal's sons were Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. Zibeon's sons were Aiah and Anah.

verses.kjv: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
verses.web: The son of Anah: Dishon. The sons of Dishon: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran, and Cheran.
verses.ct: Anah's son was Dishon. Dishon's sons were Amram, Eshban, Ithran, and Cheran.

verses.kjv: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
verses.web: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, Zaavan, and Jaakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.
verses.ct: Ezer's sons were Bilhan, Zavan, and Jakan. Dishan's sons were Uz and Aran.

verses.kjv: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
verses.web: Now these are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom, before any king reigned over the children of Israel: Bela the son of Beor; and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
verses.ct: These are the kings who ruled in Edom before Israel ever had a king: Bela son of Beor, whose capital city was Dinhabah.

verses.kjv: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
verses.web: Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his place.
verses.ct: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah became king after him.

verses.kjv: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
verses.web: Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.
verses.ct: When Jobab died, Husham from the land of the Temanites became king after him.

verses.kjv: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
verses.web: Husham died, and Hadad the son of Bedad, who struck Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Avith.
verses.ct: When Husham died, Hadad son of Bedad became king after him. Hadad was the one who defeated Midian on the plains of Moab. His capital city was Avith.

verses.kjv: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
verses.web: Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his place.
verses.ct: When Hadad died, Samlah from Masrekah became king after him.

verses.kjv: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
verses.web: Samlah died, and Shaul of Rehoboth by the River reigned in his place.
verses.ct: When Samlah died, Shaul from Rehoboth by the river became king after him.

verses.kjv: And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
verses.web: Shaul died, and Baal Hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his place.
verses.ct: When Shaul died, Baalhanan son of Achbor became king after him.

verses.kjv: And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
verses.web: Baal Hanan died, and Hadad reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Pai: and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
verses.ct: When Baalhanan died, Hadad became king after him. His capital city was Pai. His wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred and granddaughter of Mezahab.

verses.kjv: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
verses.web: Then Hadad died. The chiefs of Edom were: chief Timna, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth,
verses.ct: Then Hadad died. The chiefs of Edom were: Chief Timnah, Chief Aliah, Chief Jetheth,

verses.kjv: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
verses.web: chief Oholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,
verses.ct: Chief Aholibamah, Chief Elah, Chief Pinon,

verses.kjv: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
verses.web: chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,
verses.ct: Chief Kenaz, Chief Teman, Chief Mibzar,

verses.kjv: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
verses.web: chief Magdiel, and chief Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom.
verses.ct: Chief Magdiel, and Chief Iram. These were the chiefs of Edom.
